name: Validate chatbot API update response when chatbot ID is not found -- @1.1

steps.name: Given User sends PUT request to update chatbot API details for chatbot ID "89ebd370-38bb-43e5-9956-5c8cda370b8c" with environment ID "aae0a1b6-fafe-40af-ab20-87934343521f" and endpoint "http://34.36.66.146/stream_messages"
When the user receives the chatbot API update response
Then should be 404 for not found error
And the message should contain "Chatbot with ID 89ebd370-38bb-43e5-9956-5c8cda370b8c not found."

fullName: Update Chatbot API Details using Genr3d API: Validate chatbot API update response when chatbot ID is not found

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Update Chatbot API Details using Genr3d API

titlePath: Update Chatbot API Details using Genr3d API
